eu.title: European Union / UK

notice.content: PlanToCode is only available to residents of and users accessing from the European Union/EEA, United Kingdom, and United States. Access from all other regions is restricted. We use IP geolocation, payment verification, and other methods to enforce these restrictions. VPN or proxy use to circumvent regional restrictions is prohibited.
notice.title: Service Availability Notice
